New Records: Nick Martinez set a new Reds franchise record for strikeout-to-walk ratio in 2024
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Martinez had a solid year and deserves credit for his performance
There's skepticism about the Reds bringing him back due to his age and the financial risk involved
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nick Martinez's final start of the 2024 season was a complete game against the Cubs resulting in a 1-0 loss
Nick Martinez finished with 142.1 innings pitched, a 3.10 ERA, 18 walks, and 116 strikeouts
Nick Martinez's strikeout-to-walk ratio of 6.44 is the best by a Cincinnati Reds pitcher in their history
Nick Martinez has a player option for the 2025 season valued at $12,000,000
There is speculation about whether Nick Martinez will decline his option or accept a qualifying offer from the Reds
